contents:
Simplify operations, enhance mobility, and scale effortlessly with HPT Systems’ cloud solutions. We design and manage secure cloud environments that meet your business’s needs — from data storage to collaboration tools.
Offerings include: Microsoft 365 & Azure migration Cloud backup & disaster recovery Hybrid cloud infrastructure design Virtual desktop environments (VDI) Our goal: give you secure, anywhere-access to your business resources.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Cloud Solutions We design scalable hybrid and cloud infrastructures that fit your workflow. Migration is seamless — with zero data loss and minimal downtime. Our team secures your cloud with MFA, encryption, and identity management. We manage your cloud resources 24/7 for cost efficiency and reliability. You gain flexible, secure access to data from anywhere.
title: Cloud Solutions

contents:
Partner with HPT Systems to augment your existing IT staff. Our Co-Managed IT services deliver extra hands, tools, and expertise — without replacing your team.
We offer: Shared monitoring & management tools Escalation support for complex issues Strategic IT consulting Backup & patch management Security and compliance reporting It’s IT teamwork at its best — flexible, scalable, and collaborative.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Co-Managed IT We strengthen your existing IT team with extra expertise and tools. Shared dashboards and documentation keep everyone aligned. We handle routine maintenance so your staff can focus on strategy. Flexible collaboration — we adapt to your internal processes. You get enterprise-level support without losing internal control.
title: Co-Managed IT

contents:
Protect your business from evolving cyber threats. Our cybersecurity solutions combine advanced tools, expert oversight, and proven security frameworks to safeguard your network, data, and users.
Core protections: Threat detection & response (EDR/XDR) Email & phishing defense Multi-factor authentication (MFA) Security awareness training Penetration testing & vulnerability scans We help clients achieve compliance while minimizing downtime and data risk.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Cybersecurity We layer advanced protection including firewalls, EDR, and real-time threat detection. Every client receives a customized security stack aligned with their risk profile. We help you meet compliance standards such as HIPAA, NIST, and CMMC. Our continuous monitoring alerts you instantly to potential breaches. With incident response and recovery plans, we help you bounce back fast.
title: Cybersecurity

contents:
Your data is one of your most valuable assets — we make sure it’s always protected. HPT Systems provides automated, secure, and monitored backup solutions with quick recovery options to minimize disruption.
We provide: Local & cloud-based backups Encrypted data storage Fast system recovery Continuous data verification Ransomware recovery support Sleep easy knowing your data is always recoverable.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Data Backup & Recovery Automated, encrypted backups run daily to safeguard critical data. We test restore points regularly to ensure reliability when it matters most. Cloud and local backup options offer layered protection. Rapid recovery minimizes downtime in case of ransomware or disaster. You get detailed reporting and verification for peace of mind.
title: Data Backup & Recovery

contents:
We deliver secure, high-performance data center services — from on-premises environments to hybrid setups.
Our capabilities: Server setup & virtualization Power & cooling optimization Storage management Network redundancy & failover systems Performance monitoring HPT Systems keeps your core infrastructure running at peak efficiency
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Data Center Management Expert management of physical and virtual server environments. Redundant power, cooling, and network configurations for uptime. Scalable storage and virtualization solutions. Monitoring and optimization for peak performance. Predictable maintenance schedules reduce downtime.
title: Data Center Management

contents:
In today’s connected world, a reliable firewall is the foundation of strong cybersecurity. At HPT Systems, we specialize in Firewall Management Services that safeguard your organization’s network from cyber threats, unauthorized access, and costly downtime.
Our certified IT and security professionals provide end-to-end firewall solutions, from installation and configuration to real-time monitoring, updates, and incident response — ensuring your network stays secure, fast, and compliant.
We offer: 24/7 firewall monitoring with proactive alerts and threat prevention Custom configuration for your business size, industry, and compliance needs Seamless integration with existing infrastructure and security tools Monthly security reporting for visibility and peace of mind Ongoing maintenance and firmware updates to ensure optimal performance Whether you’re a law firm, healthcare provider, township office, or local business, HPT Systems delivers enterprise-grade protection with personal, responsive support.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Firewall Management We configure enterprise-grade firewalls tailored to your environment. Continuous monitoring and rule audits keep your perimeter secure. Regular firmware updates protect against the latest vulnerabilities. We provide monthly reports on firewall health and blocked threats. Fast response times ensure issues are resolved before they escalate.
title: Firewall Management

contents:
At HPT Systems, our Managed IT Services provide full-spectrum support to keep your business systems running smoothly. We proactively monitor, maintain, and secure your IT infrastructure so you can focus on your operations — not your technology.
Services include: 24/7 system monitoring and alerting Proactive patching and updates End-user support (remote & on-site) Network performance optimization Asset and license management We act as your outsourced IT department — delivering enterprise-level reliability with personal, local support.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Managed IT Services We deliver proactive 24/7 monitoring to prevent issues before they disrupt your operations. Our experts handle updates, patches, and maintenance so you can focus on your business. We offer flexible service plans for businesses of any size — fully managed or co-managed. You’ll always reach a live technician, not a call center queue. Our commitment to reliability means minimal downtime and maximum productivity.
title: Managed IT Services

contents:
Empower your team with the full Microsoft 365 suite — optimized, secured, and managed by HPT Systems. We handle licensing, setup, and security, ensuring your collaboration tools work flawlessly.
Services include: Tenant setup & migration Exchange Online & Teams management Backup & data retention Spam filtering & email encryption User support and training Stay connected, productive, and secure with cloud-based collaboration.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Microsoft 365 & Email Support We ensure seamless migrations with minimal downtime and data safety. Our experts configure Microsoft 365 for maximum performance and security. We provide training to help your team master Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive. 24/7 support means fast assistance whenever issues arise. Our satisfaction guarantee ensures your setup exceeds expectations.
title: Microsoft 365 & Email Support

contents:
When your internal resources are stretched thin, HPT Systems delivers dependable, responsive IT support — remote or on-site.
Our support includes: Help desk assistance Troubleshooting & repairs Hardware installation Software deployment & updates Vendor coordination We keep your systems online and your users productive.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Outsourced IT Support Reach real technicians fast — no endless ticket queues. Remote and on-site assistance for all your hardware and software needs. Predictable pricing and transparent communication. Quick issue resolution keeps your staff productive. 24/7 coverage for critical systems and emergencies.
title: Outsourced IT Support

contents:
We handle installation, networking, and troubleshooting for your business printers and multifunction devices.
We provide: Device setup & driver installation Print server configuration Network print queue management Troubleshooting and maintenance Reduce downtime and simplify office operations.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Printer & Office Machine Integration Expert setup and networking for all printer brands. Print server configuration and driver management. Troubleshooting for connectivity and performance issues. Streamlined workflows through optimized print management. Regular maintenance prevents costly downtime.
title: Printer & Office Machine Integration

contents:
Your cabling infrastructure impacts your entire network’s speed and reliability. We design, install, and test cabling systems that deliver performance you can count on.
Services: Cat6/Cat6A & fiber optic installations Patch panel organization Cable testing & certification Office rewiring and expansions HPT Systems builds infrastructure that’s ready for the future.
Why Businesses Choose HPT Systems for Structured Cabling We design and install Cat6/Cat6A and fiber systems built for speed. Clean, labeled cabling simplifies future upgrades and troubleshooting. Tested and certified connections ensure top performance. Ideal for offices, medical facilities, and municipal sites. Future-ready infrastructure supports growing bandwidth needs.
title: Structured Cabling

Introduction At HPT Systems , your privacy is a top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide when using our website or services. By using our website or services, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information:
Contact information: Name, Email Address, Phone Number, and Business Information. Account information: Username, Password, and Preferences if you create an account. Usage data: Pages visited, time spent on our site, and interaction with our services. Other information: Any details you provide voluntarily through forms, emails, or service requests. How We Use Your Information We use your information to:
Provide and improve our IT and cybersecurity services. Respond to inquiries, support requests, and service-related communications. Send updates, promotions, or information related to our services (you may opt-out at any time). Ensure website security and prevent unauthorized access. Comply with legal obligations. How We Protect Your Information We implement industry-standard security measures, including encryption, secure servers, and access controls, to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse.
Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your data only in the following circumstances:
With trusted third-party service providers who assist in delivering our services. When required by law or legal processes. To protect the rights, property, or safety of our company, clients, or others. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our website may use cookies or similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze site traffic, and provide personalized content. You can manage cookies through your browser settings.
Your Rights Depending on your location, you may have rights to:
Access, correct, or delete your personal information. Opt-out of marketing communications. Restrict or object to certain types of processing. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites and encourage you to review their privacy policies.
Children’s Privacy Our services are not directed to children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.
Third-Party Links If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how your information is handled, please contact us at:
Phone: +1 215-364-8226 Mail: info@hptsystems.com Address: 283 Second Street Pike - Suite 170, Southampton, PA 18966
